details:
The phpMyAdmin development team reports:

> phpMyAdmin has a number of mechanisms to avoid a
> clickjacking attack, however these mechanisms either work
> only in modern browser versions, or can be bypassed.
>
> "We have no solution for 3.5.x, due to the proposed
> solution requiring JavaScript. We don't want to introduce a
> dependency to JavaScript in the 3.5.x family."
summary: phpMyAdmin -- clickJacking protection can be bypassed
